welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huanggang, where modernity meets tradition in the heart of Hubei Province. Explore our city's rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning natural scenery. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories.

restaurants.name: Home Kitchen (我家小馆)
restaurants.description: Home Kitchen (我家小馆) is a hubei restaurant located in Huanggang.
restaurants.address: 大润发超市西湖路, Huanggang, 湖北

restaurants.address: 黄州大道, Huanggang, 湖北

restaurants.name: Lanzhou Ramen (Huangzhou Ave) (兰州牛肉拉面（黄州大道）)
restaurants.description: Lanzhou Ramen (Huangzhou Ave) (兰州牛肉拉面（黄州大道）) is a xinjiang restaurant located in Huanggang.

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in 鄂州市.
restaurants.address: 南浦路, 鄂州市, 湖北
